1.0.0.name: wordpress/facebook-twitter-google-social-widgets
1.0.0.description:
A simple plug-in that displays the most important social widgets from Facebook, Twitter and Google+ below your posts.

But why yet another social widgets plug-in?

This one is very easy to setup: just activate the plug-in and the social widgets are displayed immediately - no complicated configuration!

Additional info, support and developer contact:

  • English: http://www.ab-weblog.com/en/wordpress-plug-ins/social-widgets/
  • German: http://www.ab-weblog.com/de/wordpress-plug-ins/social-widgets/

Please let me know if you find a problem with this plug-in or have questions!

You can see this plug-in in action on posts of these blogs:

  • Devel
